기본정보.상담가능시간: Every Friday Morning from 9:00 am to 11 am
기본정보.수업목표:
Through Polymer Nanostructure Analysis 1, we are going to learn about not only spectroscopic analytic techniqes, such as FT-IR, NMR, and UV, but also the fundametal definition of polymers and their applications. This class is mainly given in English even though professor is going to give objectives and summary both in Korean and in English.

Therefore, students can learn about polymer synthesis as well as improve their English abilities in writing, reading and listening.
기본정보.직전강의평가\n및\nCQI반영사항:
The content of this class will include the current research trends related with this class. 
The class will be slow down when the important concept is delivered.
기본정보.주교재: Donald L. Pavia, Gary M. Lampman, George S. Kriz, James R. Vyvyan, Introduction to Spectroscopy, 4TH Eds, Brooks/Core, Australia, 2009.
기본정보.평가참고사항: Mid-term examination will be substituted by quizes.

평가방법.시험시간 연장: 평가방법 조정(대독, 구두응답, 도우미 대필 답안작성 등)
